tasks.title: Define Website Structure and Data Models
tasks.description: Define the website's structure, data models, and design tokens.
tasks.details:
1. Create a complete Sitemap/page flow diagram to visualize the website's structure.

3. Update the routing table (routes.ts) and top navigation (Header.tsx) to reflect the new structure.
4. Extract design tokens (colors, fonts, spacing) into global.scss or tokens.ts for consistent styling.
